title: Museo Reina Sofía
knownFor: Spain's national museum of 20th-century art, home to Picasso's iconic Guernica and an extensive collection of modern and contemporary Spanish art including works by Dalí and Miró.
ticketInfo: Part of the Paseo del Arte Card (€32.80 for all 3 museums - Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen). Free hours available (check website for current times). Free for under 25s.
